resources.string: Written by Brian Fraser for CMPT 276, on loan to Jack Thomas for Summer 2020 ( https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/jackt/grav-cms/cmpt276/home )
Good work finding all the cookies! Remember to share.

When playing the game, click on areas of the game to search for a cookie. If you find one, great! Otherwise you\'ll start off a scan to count how many cookies are in that row or column. You can also click a cookie to have it scan its row and column for other hidden cookies.
Icons by Everaldo Coelho ( http://www.everaldo.com/ ), images from Shutter Stock ( www.shutterstock.com ).
by Brian Fraser (who retains full credit), borrowed by Jack Thomas
